column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Everyone was very happy or ecstatic with their meals. The two people who ordered filet raved--terrific cuts
column2: brilliantly prepared. With the maître d' butter
column3: it was sinfully rich and tasty.  My wife was very happy with the salmon
column4: although the preparation was a little sweet for her taste. The buttery mashed potatoes were a delight
column5: made with chicken jus and garlic.
